net.sf.jclal.activelearning.scenario

Class AbstractScenario

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.scenario.AbstractScenario
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IConfigure, IScenario, JCLAL
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PoolBasedSamplingScenario, StreamBasedSelectiveSamplingScenario

    public abstract class AbstractScenario
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScenario, IConfigure
    Abstract class for active learning scenario. Each AL scenario must extend this class.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Maria del Carmen Rodriguez Hernandez, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected IBatchMode batchMode
      The batch mode strategy used, it allows to define wich of the analyzed instances will be selected, Ej: the best instances.
      protected IOracle oracle
      The oracle used, it allows to define as the chosen instances will be labeled.
      protected IQueryStrategy queryStrategy
      The query strategy used.
      private static long serialVersionUID

        Description copied from interface: IConfigure
        Configuration method.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

          Package: net.sf.jclal.activelearning.batchmode

          Class: All

          Class: All
